Articles.Content:
I don't know how many people Know about this one in this edition of KSP Conspiracies but I found the music for the VAB (most of the time).

I was searching for some elevator music I could use as a national anthem for My country when I came across the song Groove Grove at that royalty free music site. Link Here(You have to droll down a bit).
In the process I also found the music for the game "I Love Traffic". It is called Corncob

It's very similar.. It sounds the same!

Now I'm wondering where my spaceship parts are..
That music is all by the same artist: https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/about.php scroll down to credits and special tracks and you can find all the KSP music on that site.
My wife thinks the VAB music is straight out of Twin Peaks.
I recognise one of the 70+Km space music from Galactic Civilisations 2
The musical listed, Kevin MacLeod, I'm pretty sure he's the guy who wrote the music Danny the youtuber uses in his videos. No wonder they work so well.

I tracked down (ahem) the tracks used by KSP which are from Incompetech/Kevin MacLeod a long while ago. I compiled the lot of them and the original compositions in the KSP soundtrack into a single YouTube playlist.
There's still a few more tracks that aren't listed like the main theme, credits, one of the VAB jazz tracks, and atleast one space track.
What are the chances of some new music for the new KSC?

On 7/21/2013 at 3:25 PM, Motokid600 said:

What are the chances of some new music for the new KSC?

You got your wish! I'm really just writing this to write it. Um, this is awkward now

Well then, since this thread is well and truly dead these many years, allow me to transform the awkwardness into an awkward...

silence.
